restaurant.name: Pomodoro Ristorante & Pizzeria
restaurant.description: Lovers of vodka sauce: rejoice! Pomodoro is using their creamy vodka sauce on penne and on pizzas, too. Pomodoro also serves up appetizers, heros, Italian entrees, and salads. Still craving vodka sauce? You can order it here by the pint.
restaurant.landmark: Between Cleveland Place and Mulberry St.

restaurant.name: Salaam Bombay
restaurant.description: Prepared fresh to order, this Indian restaurant has a large menu of refined Indian cuisineNo deliveries north of Houston Street. Please allow up to 45 minutes for delivery.
restaurant.landmark: Between Duane Street to Reade Street

restaurant.name: Tribeca Pizzeria
restaurant.description: An Italian pizzeria and eatery that is synonymous with only New York. The selection alone will make you consider all your options

restaurant.name: Maggie's Cajun
restaurant.description: A cross between Cajun and Chinese food that is surprisingly hard to find in New York City. An entree with 2 sides kind of place that is sure to tantalize your taste buds.

restaurant.name: Sun Cafe
restaurant.description: A Japanese cafe ideal for a great lunch with huge rolls at a great price. With many hot food options as well, everyone can find something to enjoy here. If using a credit card to pay for your order, please indicate your tip in the special instructions.

restaurant.name: Biddy Early's Pub & Restaurant
restaurant.description: A two-floor Irish bar specializing in the Irish classics. A menu chock full of reasonable prices and bartenders exuding Irish charm, its a place where the people and food are happy.On cash orders, no bills larger than $20 please!

restaurant.name: Papa John's Pizza
restaurant.description: The nationwide pizza chain that serves up pizza with all kinds of healthy and meaty toppings.In order to process your credit card, Papa John's Pizza requires that you provide your CVV code printed on the back of your credit card. The restaurant will be contacting you after you place your order to obtain this information.

restaurant.name: Kool Bloo
restaurant.description: Offering healthy and non-healthy options 24/7, this eatery features typical American fare. No matter what you are in the mood for, Kool Bloo has something for you.

restaurant.name: XO Cafe & Grill
restaurant.description: A simple Chinese restaurant turning out the classics for their neighborhood patrons.

restaurant.name: Lily's
restaurant.description: A small restaurant that serves both Chinese and Japanese food.

restaurant.name: Sushi a la Kawa
restaurant.description: A modern sushi eatery with tons of fresh fish. A popular lunch special draws crowds and the extensive menu of Japanese cuisine always provides new options.

restaurant.name: Pita Grill
restaurant.description: A healthy eatery with a focus on Mediterranean food, although there are other worldly cuisines that are offered. Come here for a salad, panini or sandwich that will leave you feeling healthy and nourished.

restaurant.name: Little Italy Pizza
restaurant.description: A hole in the wall pizza joint that is known for the line outside as much as the notoriously fresh toppings. Classic Italian New York pizza at this place.

restaurant.name: Okami Fusion Sushi
restaurant.description: A fusion sushi spot that prides itself on top-quality, fresh fish. The restaurant often offers promotions which involve a free roll or free beer when the customer orders a certain amount.

restaurant.name: BBQ Pit (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
Cornerstone Grill
restaurant.description: A grill specializing in southern bar-b-que. With a wide variety of other options as well including burgers and fish and chips, its a great spot for anything cooked on the grill and beyond.
restaurant.landmark: Between Jay St and Duane St

restaurant.name: Lemongrass Grill
restaurant.description: A Thai grill that also has the option of karaoke in the back. Great lunch specials, and a traditional dinner make this grill worthy of a try.
restaurant.landmark: Corner of William St. & Maiden Ln.

restaurant.name: Jaya Malaysian
restaurant.description: Malaysia is a melting pot of rich and different cultures resulting in its exciting cross-cultural cuisine of traditional Malay, Indian, Indonesian, Thai and Chinese influences. This exciting, delicious, fiery, mild, tantalizing cooking is what we at Jaya present to you for your enjoyment!

restaurant.name: Sandwich House
restaurant.description: A restaurant specializing in pasta, soups, salads and sandwiches as the title indicates. They concentrate mostly on Italian offerings but the ingredients are quality and so are the people who put your food together

restaurant.name: The Odeon
restaurant.description: An American brasserie that highlights local ingredients with French cooking. Phenomenal variety on the menu sounds so good, you'll want to order one of everything.

restaurant.name: Excellent Dumpling House
restaurant.description: The name says it all, they have excellent dumplings and other Chinese specialties.

restaurant.name: Taj Tribeca/ Indian Express
restaurant.description: Indian cuisine from the north central region of Awadh. Often served in Indian palaces, this food is coming out of the Taj Tribeca kitchen and turning every visitor into royalty.

restaurant.name: The Cupping Room Cafe
restaurant.description: A neighborhood gem that has provided the services of restaurant, bar and bakery since 1977. Comfort food specialties inside the ambiance of one of the oldest buildings in SoHo makes this a must try!

restaurant.name: Koodo Sushi
restaurant.description: Providing the Wall Street area with a huge selection of sushi and Japanese cuisine for over a decade. Great spot.

restaurant.name: Palermo Pizza
restaurant.description: An authentic New York pizza counter serving up Italian pasta and entree classics.

restaurant.name: Jerry's Cafe
restaurant.description: A great spot for NYU students and residents alike. With an eclectic menu and an innovative drink selection, this is a must try in the TriBeca area.

restaurant.name: Lilly O'Brien's
restaurant.description: An Irish pub with a contemporary menu and a large beer/bar selection.

restaurant.name: Sophie's Cuban Cuisine
restaurant.description: Sophie's is known for their savory plates of traditional Cuban cuisine with daily specials. Everything is prepared from an authentic recipe and there are even some Peruvian specialties.

restaurant.name: Positano
restaurant.description: Serving up fresh and healthy Italian cuisine in the heart of Little Italy. Zagat rated and serves homemade pasta!

restaurant.name: Carl's Steaks
restaurant.description: As close as you can get to an authentic Philly cheesesteak. A taste of Philadelphia in New York

restaurant.name: Baluchi's
restaurant.description: Baluchi's, one of Zagat's top rated Indian restaurants, offers a selection of traditional & regional Indian cuisines that are carefully prepared and presented by experienced chefs. Choose from a wide variety of Indian dishes and Tandoori breads to accompany your meal.

restaurant.name: Yawa Sushi
restaurant.description: A tradition sushi spot that has a large menu and provides rolls with intense layers of flavor

restaurant.name: Goodies
restaurant.description: A small kitchen that has been dishing out deep, flavorful Chinese cuisine. Delivery has known to be fast!

restaurant.name: Burrito Mariachi
restaurant.description: A restaurant that offers a wide variety of Tex-Mex inspired dishes.

restaurant.name: Ashiyah Sushi
restaurant.description: A small sushi spot that is relatively priced. Popular for lunch and quick dinners. Good place for large parties as well.

restaurant.name: New Fresco Tortillas
restaurant.description: A unique combination where Chinese meets Mexican. The place is definitely different and pioneering a trend of combining the two popular and vastly different cuisines.

restaurant.name: Jup-She the Korean Plate
restaurant.description: Standard Korean cuisine, with authentic menu.

restaurant.name: Babaghanouge
restaurant.description: Focusing on Mediterranean cuisine, this restaurant makes sure the customer is eating a healthy meal as well as an authentic one. Estimated Delivery Time is 30 to 45 minutes.

restaurant.name: Freakin' Wings (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
Taco House
restaurant.description: Come and experience the finest Taco, Burrito, Nacho and other Mexican Food in the Downtown City Hall area. Our restaurant offers a wide array of Mexican cuisine from fresh flour Tortillas, Taco, Burritos and many more!

restaurant.name: Pho Viet Huong Restaurant
restaurant.description: Vietnamese comfort food that has locals and Vietnamese immigrants clamoring. Authentic and no frills.

restaurant.name: Xe Lua Vietnamese Restaurant
restaurant.description: An authentic Vietnamese eatery serving up classics for New York.

restaurant.name: Ruchi
restaurant.description: Provides an approach to healthy eating that includes no artificial colors, stock or food additives. All spices are freshly grounded & prepared in the kitchen.
restaurant.landmark: Btw Thames & Liberty (Greenwich St. and Trinity Pl.)

restaurant.name: Bonchon
restaurant.description: Korean fried chicken that could not be more gratifying. A unique recipe that has their following multiplying by the day. The other entrees are worth trying as well, but the mainstay is chicken, which is why its in the title.

restaurant.name: Saluggi's
restaurant.description: Brick Oven Pizza at its finest. Although the menu is not that long, it means whatever is on the menu is done really well.

restaurant.name: Petite Abeille
restaurant.description: Get acquainted with fine Belgian cuisine at an affordable price by ordering a meal from Petite Abeille. "Petite Abeille" ("little bee"), which gets its name from a popular Belgian children's book of the 1970s, has been awarded praise for its hot chocolate, Belgian waffles, and Moules-frites (mussels with fries). Their delivery menu comes complete with Belgian breakfast, lunch, dinner & dessert options.

restaurant.name: Mudville 9
restaurant.description: An unassuming bar with an out of this world menu. The beer selection is surprisingly stacked and go great with the savory cuisine.

restaurant.name: Energize Me Foods (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
Energy Kitchen
restaurant.description: As the name indicates this eatery specializes in foods that provide lots of energy and are good for you. The speedy service mimics the speed with which customers eat their creations.

restaurant.name: Tandoor Palace
restaurant.description: A to-go Indian spot with a huge menu. Than naan is big and buttery to go aside the no frills flavorful meats.

restaurant.name: Ruben's Empanadas
restaurant.description: A well known place for the Mexican specialty. With many varieties and an authentic recipe everyone can find something here.

restaurant.name: Benvenuto Cafe
restaurant.description: A reliable pizza, pasta, panini, salad and sandwich store that will satisfy your culinary needs no matter what time of day.

restaurant.name: Yi Hao Chinese Restaurant
restaurant.landmark: Intersection of Worth and Oliver Street

restaurant.name: BBQ Pit (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
BBQ Pit (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
BBQ Pit (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
Freakin' Wings (brought to you by Kool Bloo)

Freakin' Wings (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
Energize Me Foods (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
Mexican Grill (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
Mexican Grill (brought to you by Kool Bloo)
City Harvest
restaurant.description:
Make a donation to City Harvest with a Delivery.com order! You can help those in need by choosing items from the City Harvest menu. The total cost of your order will be sent as a donation to City Harvest, and help in their efforts to feed NYC's hungry. Upon receipt of your donation, you will be sent an acknowledgment letter from City Harvest.
City Harvest, the world's first and New York City's only food rescue organization, connects good food that would otherwise go to waste with people struggling with hunger. This year they will rescue 28 million pounds of food, helping to feed more than 300,000 men, women and children each week.This order will go directly to City Harvest as a monetary donation. No food will be delivered to you.

restaurant.name: Kosher Deluxe
restaurant.description: Under the strict supervision of Rabbi Amram Roth of Boro Park.

restaurant.name: Kosher Deluxe Catering
restaurant.description: Under the strict supervision of Rabbi Amram Roth of Boro Park.

restaurant.name: Palermo Pizza Catering
restaurant.description: An authentic New York pizza counter serving up Italian pasta and entree classics.

restaurant.name: New China Red
restaurant.description: Known for their ultra-fast delivery and not your average menu, New China Red is definitely as place to check out.

restaurant.name: Empire Szechuan Village
restaurant.description: Empire Szechuan Village has established itself as a cornerstone of the Greenwich Village community since 1985 by providing excellent service and great food. They feature selections in both Chinese and Japanese cuisine and also have a vegetarian section on the menu.If you require eating utensils, please indicate so in the special instructions field located in the checkout screen.

restaurant.name: Koo Sushi
restaurant.description: Koo Sushi is serving up simple and inexpensive Japanese food. Dozens of rolls--both classic and more unique--are available from this small Japanese eatery.

restaurant.name: Masamoto Japanese
restaurant.description: This Japanese restaurant offers an extensive menu, including hibachi, teriyaki, and dozens of sushi appetizers and entrees. NYU students receive a 10% discount when NYU student ID is presented.

restaurant.name: Grand Sichuan
restaurant.description: Grand Sichuan is on a mission to raise New Yorkers' appreciation and awareness of high quality Chinese cuisine. The menu features a plethora of lunch specials, and it also includes many noodle dishes, classical Sichuan dishes, and even a section devoted to the latest dishes introduced by the restaurant.

restaurant.name: Nu Sushi
restaurant.description: A small sushi spot with limited seating. Known for their fresh fish and steal of deal with an $8 bento box

restaurant.name: Dallas Jones BBQ
restaurant.description: Dallas Jones BBQ (not to be confused with the Dallas BBQ chain) is a family owned and operated barbecue joint. When it was first opened in 1984, Dallas Jones was the first delivery business for BBQ ribs. The restaurant's commitment to BBQ dishes with epicurean tastes has positioned Dallas Jones as a true original and neighborhood favorite.

restaurant.name: Olympic Pita
restaurant.description: Olympic Pita is a Midtown West kosher staple. The restaurant serves many Israeli and Middle Eastern dishes as well as sushi platters under strict kosher supervision.
restaurant.cuisines: Glatt Kosher, Kosher, OU Kosher, Israeli

restaurant.name: Bully's
restaurant.description: Bully's is one of your classic American diners in the best tradition: fast food, all your favorites, and a wide selection of foods that are especially great for a no-fuss, satisfying breakfast, lunch, or dinner.

restaurant.name: Wine Therapy
restaurant.description: Wine Therapy offers a wide selection of specialty and organic wines from around the world, and prides itself in offering lesser-known wines from small producers.

restaurant.name: Village Farm & Grocery (open 24/7)
restaurant.description: Village Farm and Grocery is a convenient grocery store, open 24/7, that delivers produce, sandwiches, ice creams, beverages, and household items.Please allow Three HOURS for delivery for any orders ABOVE 35th or BELOW BROOME Street. For orders in Brooklyn, please allow up to Four (4) HOURS for delivery. CREDIT CARD MUST BE PRESENT AT THE TIME OF DELIVERY. Please note that if you are not available to receive the order, Village Farm will charge a fee to your Credit Card no greater than 15% of the total amount.

restaurant.name: Eileen's Cheesecake
restaurant.description: A picture may be worth a thousand words but it can't compare to the creamy taste of Eileen's delectable cheesecakes. Ordering is easy, fast, and the memory of these cakes will last. Send the perfect treat to a loved one or yourself today!$1.00 extra to write on cheesecakes
restaurant.landmark: Corner of Kenamre & Centre Opposite Lafayette & Spring

restaurant.name: 2nd Ave Deli
restaurant.description: A classic New York deli that gives Kosher food justice. Traditional kosher fare that could rival any Jewish grandmother's home cooked goods as well as other more modern food means that no matter how you order, you will fall in love with 2nd Ave Deli.

restaurant.name: East River Liquors
restaurant.description: IMPORTANT - PLEASE NOTE: Credit card must be presented at the time of delivery so the restaurant can obtain an imprint and signature. They may also require proper identification that matches the credit card holder.

restaurant.name: Beacon Wines & Spirits
restaurant.description: This Upper West Side liquor store boasts a wide selection of alcoholic beverages for budgets big and small. Upon checkout, please include your billing address in the delivery instructions field. Beacon Wines & Spirits also requires that you provide the CVV code from the back of your credit card. They will be contacting you after you place your order to obtain this information. We also recommend that your credit card be presented at the time of delivery so the merchant can obtain an imprint and signature. They may also require proper identification that matches the credit card hold

restaurant.name: 10th Ave Wine & Liquors
restaurant.description: IMPORTANT - PLEASE NOTE: Credit card must be presented at the time of delivery so the merchant can obtain an imprint and signature. They may also require proper identification that matches the credit card holder.

restaurant.name: Gracie's Wines
restaurant.description: Gracie's Wines features an eclectic selection of wines from across the globe at varying prices. Don't be surprised to stumble upon a hard-to-find liquor in this small wine shop!

restaurant.name: Il Cantuccio
restaurant.description: Il Cantuccio uses entirely authentic recipes when preparing their biscotti, bread, pizza, and focaccia menu items (including Italian sandwiches). With selected prime quality ingredients, careful handmade production, and the respect of the original recipes (no type of fat, preservative or food coloring is used), Il Cantuccio creates Italian specialties in the traditional fashion.

restaurant.name: Pita City Catering
restaurant.description: Believing that great health and great taste can be obtained at the same time, Pita City Falafel opened in 1996 in hopes of promoting a distinct kind of healthy cuisine to Chelsea. Pita City presents wholesome Syrian food with friendly service and atmosphere. Pita City's menu features the highest quality ingredients served family style, and the results are scrumptious.

restaurant.name: Green Cafe Catering
restaurant.description: At Green Cafe there really is something for everyone to enjoy. Menu options range from sandwiches and wraps to salads and paninis.

restaurant.name: Dexter Myers Cookies
restaurant.description: -- Customer must give 24 hours advance notice -- Customer will be notified of approximate delivery time range. -- Minimum order amount for delivery is $50 -- We have a flat rate of $11 for delivery anywhere within the five boroughs of New York City.

restaurant.name: Fine & Schapiro
restaurant.description: For over 80 years, Fine & Schapiro have served traditional Jewish food. You can order anything from a quick deli sandwich to a full Kosher meal at this gourmet eatery. Kosher Food Under Rabbinical Supervision of Israel Mayer Steinberg

restaurant.name: Burger Shoppe
restaurant.description: An old-school burger shoppe with a nostalgic counter. As a menu full of innovative burgers with sides done right. Expect nothing less than a long line during lunch.
restaurant.cuisines: Burgers, American, Casual Dining, Contemporary American

restaurant.name: Tribeca Pizzeria Catering
restaurant.description: Tribeca Pizzeria Catering is an extension of the popular Tribeca pizzeria. Dishing out Italian classics for the masses and neighbors alike.

restaurant.name: Ritz Asia Fusion Catering
restaurant.description: Asian Fusion takes center stage at Ritz Asia, where a combination of Japanese, Chinese, and Thai specialties are on the extensive menu. Order from a wide array of appetizers, dim sum, sushi, noodles, and gourmet entrees.

restaurant.name: Organic Direct
restaurant.description: With OrganicDirect you can have groceries delivered to your fridge without the hassle of going to the store. You'll find everything you need in their large selection of organic groceries, frozen natural food and fresh organic fruits and vegetables.- If you are not present at the time of delivery, you will be charged the total cost of the order. - OrganicDirect reserves the right to change your delivery day or time due to unforeseen circumstances, and will inform you in that scenario. - All products, specifically produce, are subject to occasional change in price. - If an item is out of stock, OrganicDirect will try to substitute it for an item of equal value and quality. The customer always has the option of refusing a substitution. - Promotions are limited to one per household / per person / per address and cannot be combined with any other offers. - For cancellations and information on returns, exchanges and missing items, please contact 1-800-709-7191.

restaurant.name: Manhattan Wine Xchange Gift Baskets
restaurant.description: If sending to a recipient other than yourself, put the GIFT BASKET RECIPIENT'S address in the SPECIAL INSTRUCTION BOX upon checkout Orders are shipped by UPS for delivery between 9am-7pm Place orders by 2pm for next day delivery Cancellations - please notify before 4pm (orders ship at 5) Manhattan Wine Xchange offers the most user-friendly, ultra-customizable service for your gift-giving needs. We have a personalized wine gift basket for every budget and every type of recipient.
